name: The Last Planets
description:
Assembled by a single indie developer and an awesome sound designer, The Last Planets is a FREE 2D/3D scroller videogame for Android with Online and Soulslike features, endless and strange Galaxies, account progression, different planets to play and some Achievements/Quests to do.

You can play both Online or Offline in this game and also "cooperate" with the whole community to unlock game contents. So grab or make new friends to explore the hidden areas of the game...

No P2W(Pay To Win), No advertisings, you can freely play the game and then pay to get it.

Enter in our Discord and Reddit Community to share your ideas and improve the game:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFgxHSCQQ5OJJWaLgthvUMA
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/cvRJ9KN
Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/TronusGames

Musics and Sounds by Marco Marocco and under Copyright.
